Este juego me encanta, es de mis favoritos!!!
Great game. The level builder adds a lot of value beyond the campaigns.
I liked the plot twist and the complexity of the game.

One of the best games of its genre. I like this game better than portal 1 for the insanity that takes place in it. I'm not going to write an overblown review for this game as almost everyone that was interested has played it. I do hope valve makes a VR version of this game as it would be fantastic!

Just a quick breakdown: 
This is a first person, story-driven, puzzle game with lots of charm and humor. If you like any of those things pick it up as you won't be wasting your money. While it's not essential to play the first game, I would suggest it since this game follows in its footsteps. The first is not as charming as this game, but it still has some good moments.
This gem is aging very slowly. Must play if you are into puzzle games.
Let perfect than the first, but larger, zanier, and brilliant in its own right.

This game is amazing. There is nothing else I have to say, but I will. This used to be my favorite game of all time, and one I replayed many times on the Xbox 360 when I first got it. This game is as close to perfection as it could possibly be, bar one puzzle that frustrated me. It takes everything the first game did, and enhance it by 20 times. The puzzles, game play, humor, there isn't a single thing I can't think of that I don't like about this game outside of one bad puzzle. I can't say what the multiplayer is like, but I bet it's fun as well. Buy the game at any price, and you won't regret it.
